name: Calm Falls 2
storyline:
The journalist Dave Sherlington is visiting the town of Calm Falls to investigate the ongoing series of unsolved missing cases.
However the longer his investigation goes on, the more he is confronted by mysterious events that just open up new questions. As he is stepping into the darker and more disturbing reality of the place, he knows that whatever happened at this place is more disturbing than he ever could've imagined.
summary: Calm Falls 2 is the sequel to Kelven's first game Calm Falls. Despite being set in the same town and using the same title, the story is not directly connected and both can be played as an standalone game.
